metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the shade programming button for 3 seconds. Release when LED flashes.
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the shade programming button for 3 seconds. Release when LED flashes.
metadata.reset:
Z-Wave Reset: Exclude from the controller before doing this. Press and hold the button on the shade for approximately 10 seconds, and release when the shade jogs.

Full Reset: Press and hold the button on the shade for approximately 15 seconds (the LED will stop flashing when complete) - you will need to set top / bottom / home positions.
